content: our may 2018 maker s league project 1 is a new use for one of our favorite yarns of the year uneek worsted 2 we ve divided the yarn in half to play with the stripes the pattern is for two pairs of fingerless mitts or a hat knit with one skein of uneek worsted that you split into two balls stripes are alternated between balls fun 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/makers-league htm 2 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/uneek-worsted-x29803170 htm
